{"step_by_step_thinking": "The third molars, also known as wisdom teeth, are the last teeth to develop and erupt into the mouth. They usually start to calcify around the age of 8-10 years. Therefore, the calcification of the third molar does not begin at 8 months or 18 months, which are too early, or at 16 years, which is too late.", "answer_choice": "C. 8 years"}
